Pre-Game Insights: Houston Rockets (24-12, second in the Western Conference) vs. Memphis Grizzlies (24-13, third in the Western Conference)
The Grizzlies are 11-10 in Western Conference games. Memphis ranks second in the league with 35.8 defensive rebounds per game led by Santi Aldama averaging 5.7.
The Rockets are 7-1 against the rest of the division. Houston is 3-3 in one-possession games.

The 123.1 points per game the Grizzlies average are 16.3 more points than the Rockets give up (106.8). The Rockets average 112.9 points per game, 1.8 fewer than the 114.7 the Grizzlies allow to opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 123.1 points per game the Grizzlies average are 16.3 more points than the Rockets give up (106.8). The Rockets average 112.9 points per game, 1.8 fewer than the 114.7 the Grizzlies allow to opponents.
The 100th meeting between the two rival teams.
